name: Archangel
ability: Minions are good and don't know who the demon is.

otherNightReminder: Krampus chooses a player to die. A previously chosen player becomes alive.
name: Krampus
ability: Each night*, choose a player: If they are good, they die and may be resurrected next night.

name: Jezus Christ
ability: The first good player to die at night does not. Evil wins on 3rd dawn.

otherNightReminder: A player dies tonight. Snowmay may become alive.
name: Snowman
ability: 3 good players know you are in the game. If all of them die, evil wins.

otherNightReminder: Santa chooses two players to receive presents.
name: Santa Claus
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players with no presents: If they choose to unwrap it, they die or become poisoned. If 3 presents are wrapped, evil wins.

otherNightReminder: Grinch chooses a player, they die and Grinch learns and becomes their character.
name: Grinch
ability: Each night*, choose a player, they die. You learn and become their character until the next night. [+1 outsider]

otherNightReminder: All other players choose whether to kill one of they neightbours. Evil wins if no one does.
name: One King
ability: Each non-demon player is woken at night: they may choose to kill one of their alive neighbours, if no one does, evil wins. [+2 kings, -2 minions]

name: Saint Nicholas
ability: A good player who lied the most during the day dies at night. [+Krampus, +Angel]
